org.insomnia.rollit.shared.network

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.insomnia.rollit.shared.network.Packet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PacketRaw

    public abstract class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an abstract base for packets that will be send between the server and client.
    Author:
    Ciske

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PACKET_HEADER_SIZE 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Packet deserialize(byte[] serializedData)
      Deserializes the array of bytes to a new Packet instance.
      PacketType getType()
      Returns the type of the packet.
      byte[] serialize()
      Serializes the packet to an array of bytes that can be send across the network.

      • PACKET_HEADER_SIZE

        public static int PACKET_HEADER_SIZE

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public PacketType getType()
        Returns the type of the packet.

      • serialize

        public byte[] serialize()
        Serializes the packet to an array of bytes that can be send across the network.

      • deserialize

        public static Packet deserialize(byte[] serializedData)
                          throws PacketFormatException
        Deserializes the array of bytes to a new Packet instance. A PacketFormatException is thrown if the data could not be deserialized.
        Parameters:
        serializedData - The serialized data as received over the network.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a class that extends Packet which has all fields set according to the serialized data.
        Throws:
        PacketFormatException
